summary: An addon for Wet and Cold, which goes beyond the scope of the original mod to spread holiday cheer throughout Skyrim.
descriptionHtml: [center][/center][size=4]This addon is no longer supported. See [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64820/?]here[/url] for the updated, standalone version.[/size]
author: isoku

files.name: Wet and Cold - Holidays v1_07
files.changelogHtml:
The wounded in the Temple of Kynareth should no longer join in on the festivities.

NPCs should now wear festive hats throughout Saturalia day as intended instead of only past 5PM.

Fixed a floating civil war decoration in Solitude.

Minor optimizations.

files.name: Wet and Cold - Holidays Patch for Open Cities
files.fileName: Wet and Cold - Holidays Patch for Open Cities-51472-.7z
